title: Netflix Gives Users Double Thumbs-Up Button to Mark Shows, Movies They Really Love
sub_head: Streaming giant already let users give content thumbs up, thumbs down
body:
Netflix Inc. wants to know when viewers really love its content.
The streaming giant is offering users the option to give a double thumbs-up on content they love to show Netflix what types of series and movies they want to watch. The new double thumbs-up feature is in addition to the companyâ€™s buttons allowing users to give content a single thumbs-up or thumbs-down.
